uvi.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.54
uvi.description:
ipv6: fix another slab-out-of-bounds in fib6_nh_flush_exceptions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.54 by commit ce8fafb68051fba52546f8bbe8621f7641683680, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit f88d8ea67fbdbac7a64bfa6ed9a2ba27bb822f74. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipv6: fix another slab-out-of-bounds in fib6_nh_flush_exceptions
